text: Sheer Heart Attack is the third studio album by Queen and was released on 8 November 1974 by EMI Records in the United Kingdom and by Elektra Records in the United States. It went to number 2 in the United Kingdom, number 6 in Canada and France, number 7 in Finland and the Netherlands, number 9 in Norway, number 12 in the United States, number 19 in Australia and number 23 in Japan. == Track listing == === Original release === All lead vocals by Freddie Mercury unless noted. === Universal Music reissue (2011) === === iTunes deluxe edition === == References == Category:1974 albums Category:Queen (band) albums Category:Elektra Records albums
title: Sheer Heart Attack
